Hi, I’m David Ruiz

Computer Engineer | C & C++ Developer | IoT & Embedded Systems Enthusiast

Welcome to my digital portfolio! I’m a passionate software engineer from Málaga, Spain, specializing in C and C++ development.

Currently working as a Software Engineer at Minsait, where I develop software solutions using C/C++ on Linux and Windows environments. My expertise spans from low-level programming to system integration, with a strong focus on IoT systems.

Core Technologies

Languages: C/C++, Python, Java, SQL.
Systems: Linux/Unix, FreeRTOS, Embedded Systems
Protocols: MQTT, TCP/IP, SSL/TLS.
Tools: Git, Apache, MySQL, Android Development, SubVersion
